name: NoTouch v1.0
description:
It's a tiny game that you should use your mouse to drag the character to move and cannot touch any things except coins and safeground.

There are some skills that I am developing now. But for now , you can press "space" to slow down everythings that you dodge blocks easily.

Besides,you also can press "r" to restart immediately. 

By the way, it's my second game. So, I will be very glad that you can give me any opinions and suggestions. Thank your every much!!!
